numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In most countries, many teenagers and young adults think that the world is getting better.
3. In most countries, many people over 40 do not think that the world is getting better.
4. I wonder about the reason for this trend.
5. One possible reason is that young people have more confidence in their own race.
7. This trend relates to my community.
9. I am in the age range of the first group.
10. A possible headline is: Most young adults have more confidence in newer generations than older adults.
13. It is difficult to find a headline for this graph.
